Job Title: Hiring :: Staff Software Development Engineer, WiFi Mesh
Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities Hiring :: Staff Software Development Engineer, WiFi MeshResponsibilities::source PRPL foundation, providing the opportunity for the team to act as the maintainers of a big scale open source project. As a software engineer in our team, you will participate in multidisciplinary open source projects (PrplMesh, hostapd, openwrt, and more) and collaborate with other members in the open source community in the design, development, implementation, and certification of the EasyMesh standard.So if you're smart, highly motivated, think outside the box and are passionate about design and development of a large scale distributed system - your place is with us!Qualifications::Excellent C programming skillsMust have Object-oriented C++ programming skillsGood knowledge of 802.11, mesh and security protocolsGood knowledge of networking protocolsBash/Linux shell, python experienceEmbedded Linux development experienceBS in Electrical Engineering, Electronics or Computer Science +8 years of experience, or MS +5 years of experience, or Ph.D. +3 years of experience
